title: CHAPTER I. THE MYSTERIOUS NUMBER SEVEN.

book.title: Beryl of the Biplane
book.description: 简介： His companion, George Bellingham, who was in the uniform of the Royal Flying Corps, wearing the silver wings of the pilot, was perhaps three years his senior, fair-haired, grey-eyed, with a small sandy moustache trimmed to the most correct cut....
